DataElement.preferredName: Scientific Publication Experiment Cell Line Source java.lang.String
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A class of publication in which original scientific work is described.  The format usually includes an introduction in which relevant concepts are identified and the experimental system under study is presented, a section describing the experiments that were performed to test a specific hypothesis and the results and observations that were obtained, a section in which the results are discussed relative to findings by other investigators and the current state of knowledge in the field, and a section describing the experimental methods and procedures in sufficient detail to enable the reproduction of the work by independent investigators._In the scientific method, an experiment is a set of actions and observations, performed to verify or falsify a hypothesis or research a causal relationship between phenomena. The experiment is a cornerstone of the empirical approach to knowledge. (from Wikipedia):Cells of a single type that have been grown in the laboratory for several generations (cell divisions).:Source; where something is available._Generic value domain for a java datatype that is a class that represents character strings.

Concepts.definition: A class of publication in which original scientific work is described.

Property.preferredDefinition: In the scientific method, an experiment is a set of actions and observations, performed to verify or falsify a hypothesis or research a causal relationship between phenomena. The experiment is a cornerstone of the empirical approach to knowledge. (from Wikipedia):Cells of a single type that have been grown in the laboratory for several generations (cell divisions).:Source; where something is available.

Concepts.definition: A coordinated set of actions and observations designed to generate data, with the ultimate goal of discovery or hypothesis testing.
A permanently established cell culture that will proliferate indefinitely given appropriate fresh medium and space.
Where something is available or from where it originates.
